strings: <se_low>*: Grrr...
<se_low>*: Grrrrrr...

<se_low>*: Where am I...?
Who are you?

<se_low>*: My name is Estark...
That is all I can recall.
<se_low>Estark: I do not even remember if I am good or evil.

<se_low>Estark: Why are you here?
Have you come to destroy me?

<se_low>Estark: Then I have no choice.
I do not wish to be destroyed.
<se_low>Estark: Then you seek to harness my power to destroy the world?
<se_low>Estark: Hm, interesting. But first I must assess whether your own powers are compatible with mine.
<se_low>Estark: Which means you roused me from my slumber for nothing. A crime for which you will pay dearly, I assure you.
<se_low>Estark: Let us fight!

<se_low>Estark: Grrrrrr... How is this possible!?
You defeated me!
And in only <val_1> <IF_SING val_1>turn!
Cheat! Insolent CHEAT! Still...<ELSE_NOT_SING>turns!<ENDIF_SING>
<se_low>Estark: An impressive achievement, even if I have only just woken from sleep. For <IF_SOLO>a human<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>humans<ENDIF_SOLO>, you are unusually strong.
<se_low>Estark: For your pains, I grant you this bracer.

<se_low>Estark: Grrrrrr...
Interesting. To defeat me in only <val_1> turns...
<se_low>Estark: I didn't expect <IF_SOLO>a human<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>humans<ENDIF_SOLO> to be so entertaining. Just right for limbering up after my long slumber.

<se_low>Estark: As a token of my appreciation,
I grant you this bracer.

<se_low>Estark: Grrrrrr... <val_1> turns?
That's what it takes for you to defeat me?
<se_low>Estark: You are weak. Too weak to rouse me properly from my long slumber.
<se_low>Estark: Take this bracer and see if you can't muster some more strength with it. Then at least doing battle with you might give me some amusement.
<Cap><leader> obtains the Lord's bracer and puts it in the bag.
<se_low>Estark: That is a very special bracer, imbued with my inimitable powers.
<se_low>Estark: If you think yourself of a strong enough will to resist being enveloped by its fearsome magic, equip yourself with it, and let us do battle again.

<se_low>Estark: You may have defeated me this time,
but I will not be so lenient again.
<se_low>Estark: Your victory over me was...passable. But I wish to be entertained! Let me see your true potential in our next battle.
<se_low>Estark: If you cannot improve your performance for our next battle, you will meet with a very bitter end indeed. I will destroy you all!
<se_low>Estark: My powers will have you fleeing in abject terror. Grrrrrr...

<se_low>Estark: Grrrrrr... How is this possible!?
You defeated me!
And in only <val_1> <IF_SING val_1>turn!
Cheat! Insolent CHEAT!<ELSE_NOT_SING>turns!<ENDIF_SING>

<se_low>Estark: Grrrrrr... Interesting.
To defeat me in only <val_1> turns...

<se_low>Estark: Grrrrrr... <val_1> turns?
That's what it takes for you to defeat me?
<se_low>Estark: And that was faster than your previous attempt of <val_1> turns.

<se_low>Estark: You would be a worthy match for the
legendary hero, even, defeating me,
Lord of the Underworld, in such short order.
You are <IF_SOLO>a great warrior<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>great warriors<ENDIF_SOLO>.

<se_low>Estark: Humans are my sworn enemy!
But you have my respect.
All hail <leader>!
<se_low>Estark: For your pains, I grant you this...
<se_low>Estark: To have laid claim to such incredible power without using the Secret of Evolution, and yet not to have lost your soul to its might...
<se_low>Estark: You humans are a breed more powerful than I had imagined.

<se_low>Estark: For taking me so spectacularly by surprise,
I grant you this...
<se_low>Estark: Grrrrrr... I sense Dragovian within you. It is the power of the dragon in your blood that let you defeat me, is it?
<se_low>Estark: Interesting... To have both human and Dragovian blood in your veins...

<se_low>Estark: For taking me so spectacularly by surprise,
I grant you this...
<se_low>Estark: Of course, I am not fully awake yet, but still... To have put up such a fight against me is impressive.

<se_low>Estark: Yes, you are worthy opposition.
Henceforth, I shall regard you as my enemy.

<se_low>Estark: And in recognition of your skills,
I grant you this...

<se_low>Estark: Hm, how the times are changing.
Of course, I am still waking up, but nevertheless, you put up an admirable fight.
<se_low>Estark: You have amused me well, especially for <IF_SOLO>a human<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>humans<ENDIF_SOLO>. Just right for limbering up after my long slumber.
<se_low>Estark: For your timely entertainment, I grant you this...
<se_low>Estark: You are weak. Too weak to rouse me properly from my long slumber.

<se_low>Estark: If you wish to engage me in a real battle,
you will have to hone your skills considerably.
<se_low>Estark: Take this and see if you can't muster some more strength. Then at least doing battle with you might give me some amusement.
<se_low>Estark: But know this, <leader>! I will make sure that I am stronger the next time we meet.
<se_low>Estark: You defeated me this time, but next time we meet, I will not be so lenient.
<se_low>Estark: You defeated me this time, but next time we meet, I will not be so lenient.

<se_low>Estark: Now I have accepted you as my enemy,
know this: If you come to battle me again with
your half-hearted, half-baked skills and tactics,
I will destroy you completely!
<se_low>Estark: You showed promise this time, but next time you face me, make sure you are stronger and more able to keep me entertained.

<se_low>Estark: If you come to battle me again this way,
I will destroy you. You would do well to
hone your skills first.
<se_low>Estark: My powers will have you fleeing in abject terror. Grrrrrr...
<Cap><leader> obtains 10 seeds of strength and puts them in the bag.
<Cap><leader> obtains 10 seeds of defence and puts them in the bag.
<Cap><leader> obtains 10 seeds of agility and puts them in the bag.
<Cap><leader> obtains 10 seeds of wisdom and puts them in the bag.
<Cap><leader> obtains 10 seeds of life and puts them in the bag.
<Cap><leader> obtains 10 seeds of magic and puts them in the bag.
<Cap><leader> obtains 10 seeds of skill and puts them in the bag.
